title: IT skill shortages facing IT leaders worldwide 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different IT categorys on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in IT category Big data / analytics and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in IT category Artificial intelligence.
Among all the IT categorys, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in IT category Big data / analytics and lowest SOME LABEL in IT category Artificial intelligence.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in IT category Big data / analytics was 42.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in IT category Artificial intelligence.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different IT categorys on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
IT category Big data / analytics had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 3 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in IT category Artificial intelligence for 2017.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different IT categorys on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in IT category Big data / analytics and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in IT category Artificial intelligence.
Among all the IT categorys, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in IT category Big data / analytics and lowest SOME LABEL in IT category Artificial intelligence.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in IT category Big data / analytics was 42.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in IT category Artificial intelligence.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 9 different IT categorys for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
IT category Big data / analytics had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 3 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in IT category Artificial intelligence for 2017.
In IT category Big data / analytics, 2017 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in IT category Artificial intelligence out of all 9 IT categorys.
There is a gap of 41.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017 in IT category Big data / analytics and Artificial intelligence.
Among all 3 groups, 2018 had the gap of 46.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in IT category Big data / analytics and Artificial intelligence respectively.

2018 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 3 groups in IT category Big data / analytics followed by 2018 in Big data / analytics, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2017 in Artificial intelligence.
Averaging all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019, the IT category Big data / analytics is the maximum SOME LABEL and Artificial intelligence is the minimum SOME LABEL.
